howItWorks.title: How It Works in 3 Simple Steps
howItWorks.subtitle: Your journey to a healthier relationship with food starts here

step1.title: Chat About Your Day
step1.description: Talk naturally with our AI about your eating habits, feelings, and triggers. No complicated forms—just an honest conversation. Start with 10 messages daily for free, or go unlimited with Premium.

step2.title: Uncover Your Patterns
step2.description: Our AI spots what's really driving your eating habits—the good and the not-so-good. You'll see patterns you never noticed and understand what triggers your choices.

step3.title: Build New Habits with Daily Challenges
step3.description: Get 5 personalized challenges every day based on your unique patterns. Complete them, track your progress, and watch your relationship with food transform. Premium members also learn why each challenge works for them.

faq.title: Common Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before you start

question1.q: Is my data private and secure?
question1.a: Absolutely. Everything you share is encrypted with the same security banks use. Your conversations are completely private—we'll never share or sell your data to anyone. What you tell the AI stays with the AI.

question2.q: How does this actually help me change?
question2.a: Think of it as having a really insightful friend who notices patterns you don't. Our AI analyzes your daily conversations to spot what's really driving your eating habits. Then it gives you personalized challenges to help you build better patterns. It's like having a coach who knows your story.

question3.a: Yes! There's zero commitment. Cancel whenever you want and you'll keep Premium access until the end of your current billing period. The free plan is always available if you decide to downgrade.

question4.q: I'm terrible at journaling. Will this work for me?
question4.a: Good news—this isn't journaling! It's more like texting a friend about your day. Just chat naturally about what happened, how you felt, and what you ate. The AI will ask helpful questions to keep the conversation going. No pressure, no blank pages.

question5.q: What's the real difference between Free and Premium?
question5.a: Free is perfect for trying things out: 10 daily messages and weekly pattern analysis. Premium gives you 50 messages per day, daily analysis so you spot patterns faster, and explanations that show you exactly why each challenge is designed for you. Think of Premium as the fast track.

question6.q: Is this a replacement for therapy?
question6.a: No, and we're upfront about that. EmotionEat helps you understand your patterns and build better habits, but it's a tool—not a therapist. If you're dealing with a serious eating disorder, please work with a qualified healthcare professional. We're here to support your journey, not replace professional care.
